scenario: I'm preparing to relocate to California for an academic job in computer science. I need to find current tenured/tenure-track openings in Computer Sciences & Technology in California, identify a beginner computer science course that includes advertisement skills I can teach or recommend, and look for suitable 2-bedroom+ apartments under $4,000/month near potential campuses. I'll use this information to decide which positions to apply to and plan housing and course prep if I get an offer.
combined_task: Research relocation and job-prep for pursuing tenured/tenure-track Computer Sciences & Technology positions in California by (1) finding current faculty openings in that field and state, (2) locating a beginner computer science course that includes advertisement skills to prepare for teaching or recommendation, and (3) browsing available apartments with at least 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms priced up to $4,000/month near prospective campuses.
